synopsis:
Graduate Work 2012 from Senri IIDA, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

A high-school girl came to an amusement park in the afternoon. She lost her bear key-holder when she changed key-holders. Misunderstanding to be abandoned, the bear tries to follow her. Can he really regain her love?

(Source: GEIDAI ANIMATION)
